[Y-Erasmus Hall Records (MS 201) (folder 3 of 3)] Map of the town of Flatbush, made Nov. 10, 1797 by Jeremiah Lott
[Y-Erasmus Hall Records (MS 201) (folder 3 of 3)] Map of the town of Flatbush, made Nov. 10, 1797 by Jeremiah Lott

Reproduction certified as accurate by the State Engineer and Surveyor, 1902. 18 x 26". Gift of Herebert [sic] S. Wynkoop, 1912.
See Guide to the Erasmus Hall Records, 1325–1989 (bulk, circa 1775–1975), MS 201.
